[[My Strings]]
	[key1]
		en = key1-english
		tags = tag1
		comment = This is a comment
		es = key1-spanish
		fr = key1-french
	[key2]
		en = key2-english
		tags = tag2
		fr = key2-french
	[key3]
		en = key3-english
		tags = tag1,tag2
		es = key3-spanish
		fr = key3-french
	[key4]
		en = key4-english
